name: yt
description: install mongoDB and mongoSH ```bash mongosh show dbs use <databasename> show collections cls exit use  ``` ```js db.users() db.dropDatabase() db.users.insertOne({name: "boi"}) db.users.insertOne({name: "sally", age:19, address:{street:"xyz", block:"d"}, hobbies:"none"}) db.users.find() db.users.find({<object>}) db.users.find({<object>}, {<whatYouWantToReturn>}) db.users.find(){.sort({name:1}), .skip(1), .limit(2)} db.users.insertMany([{name:"john"}, {name:"natasha", age:18}]) ``` sorting -> 1 = ascending , -1 = descending complex queries $eq $ne $lt $lte $gt $gte $in -> kinda like or requires list $nin {$exists: true/false} $and: [{}, {}] $or: [{}, {}] $expr: {<$comparitiveExpresson: ["$field1", "$field2"]>}
